story.title: Creator Profile Enhancements & Social Growth Tools
story.userStory:
**As a** creator building an audience,
**I want** enhanced profile pages with social metrics and shareable links,
**so that** new followers can discover my work and I can track growth.
acceptanceCriteria: Redesign creator profile page to highlight bio, social links, follower/following counts, and featured creations (pinned/most popular).
Provide growth analytics widget showing follower trends, top referrers, and engagement metrics (leveraging `engagement_events`).
Add shareable profile link with OG metadata, optional QR code, and integration with external social channels.
Observability tracks profile visits, share link usage, and growth metrics; dashboards visualize creator growth funnels.
Tests cover profile UI, analytics data accuracy, share link functionality, and regression when social features disabled.

subtasks.title: Implement new layout with sections for bio, featured creations, follower stats.
Support pinned creations chosen by creator.
Build analytics widget pulling data from `engagement_events` / follower logs.
Provide filters (7d/30d) and tooltips explaining metrics.
Generate share URL with OG tags and optional QR code.
Track clicks/ referrals in analytics.
Emit metrics (`profile.visits`, `profile.shareClicks`).
Document dashboards for creator growth.
Playwright tests for profile UI and analytics widget.
Unit tests for share link tracking.
Manual regression verifying flag fallback.

testing: Unit + integration tests as per testing strategy. `[Source: architecture.md#8-Testing-Strategy]`
